Text: Many thanks for your fantastic anime as well as other animation uploads, fantastic stuff, cheers

first of all, despo1ler - you are amazing, thank you so much for uploading this and the other marvel animes, i've been looking for them for so long, thank you!
i was just wondering when/if you will be uploading the rest of the blade anime series? i know it has only just started in japan but i just wondered if you were going to have a set day for the next episode each week or something.
thanks : )
